name: Electronics Puzzle Lab
description:
Enter the most advanced challenge laboratory of today's games, where electronics and logic merge into challenges that will captivate your mind and awaken the engineer within you!



Start with basic puzzles and progress to advanced challenges that will test your limits in logic and electronic knowledge. But don't worry, even those without electronics knowledge can solve the challenges as new components are introduced.







From simple combinations to complex circuits, each stage is a new puzzle waiting to be unraveled. You'll have everything you need, from basic logic gates to sophisticated components, to solve each puzzle.



Ready to dive into the fascinating universe of electronics and redefine what you know about puzzles?


Warning:
This game simplifies electronics for easy fun, no expertise needed. It's not a precise circuit simulator but a series of puzzles meant to entertain and maybe spark an interest in electronics. Dive in and enjoy the challenges!
